con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def responseClientToken = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info responseClientToken def parseJson = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseClientToken) log.info parseJson def actualToken = parseJson.status log.info actualToken

con:config.script: import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat log.info("=======================test started for get customer by Id from Excel=======================") def file=new File("C:\\Users\\TUNGATHAVAJANTungath\\Desktop\\Tungath-Oct28\\IBM SDET\\Rest Assignment\\Create.xls"); def workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number Cell c=workSheet.getCell(0,1) log.info("Customer Firstname "+c.getContents()); Cell c1=workSheet.getCell(1,1) log.info("Customer Lastname" +c1.getContents()); Cell c2=workSheet.getCell(2,1) Cell c3=workSheet.getCell(3,1) Cell c4=workSheet.getCell(4,1) Cell c5=workSheet.getCell(5,1) Cell c6=workSheet.getCell(6,1) Cell c7=workSheet.getCell(7,1) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Firstname", c.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Lastname", c1.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Email", c2.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Password", c3.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Confirm", c4.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("telephone", c5.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("customer_group_id", c6.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("agree", c7.getContents())

import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat log.info("=======================test started for get customer by Id from Excel=======================") def file=new File("C:\\Users\\TUNGATHAVAJANTungath\\Desktop\\Tungath-Oct28\\IBM SDET\\Rest Assignment\\Create.xls"); def workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows Cell c2=workSheet.getCell(2,1) Cell c3=workSheet.getCell(3,1) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Email", c2.getContents()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Password", c3.getContents())

import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat log.info("=======================test started for get customer by Id from Excel=======================") def file=new File("C:\\Users\\TUNGATHAVAJANTungath\\Desktop\\Tungath-Oct28\\IBM SDET\\Rest Assignment\\Update.xls"); def workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows Cell c2=workSheet.getCell(2,1) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Email", c2.getContents())

import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat log.info("=======================test started for get customer by Id from Excel=======================") def file=new File("C:\\Users\\TUNGATHAVAJANTungath\\Desktop\\Tungath-Oct28\\IBM SDET\\Rest Assignment\\Create.xls"); def workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows Cell c2=workSheet.getCell(3,1) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Password", c2.getContents())

import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat log.info("=======================test started for get customer by Id from Excel=======================") def file=new File("C:\\Users\\TUNGATHAVAJANTungath\\Desktop\\Tungath-Oct28\\IBM SDET\\Rest Assignment\\Create.xls"); def workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows def pSet = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties") Cell c2=workSheet.getCell(3,1) Cell c3=workSheet.getCell(4,1) pSet.setPropertyValue("Password", c2.getContents()) pSet.setPropertyValue("Confirm", c3.getContents())
